Isabella Rodriguez.description: still working at the counter, taking orders and chatting with customers @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:behind the cafe counter

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller are making plans to meet up at Hobbs Cafe tomorrow at 3pm to discuss Klaus's research findings on the impact of gentrification on community services, with Klaus bringing his laptop to show data and Maria preparing questions for the discussion. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus, how's the paper coming along?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, it's coming along. I'm working on the section about the impact of gentrification on community services.
Maria Lopez
That sounds interesting, I'd love to hear more about your research findings.
Klaus Mueller
I'd be happy to share my research findings with you! How about we grab a coffee sometime and I can tell you all about it?
Maria Lopez
That sounds great! How about we meet at Hobbs Cafe tomorrow around 3pm?
Klaus Mueller
Sounds like a plan! I'll see you at Hobbs Cafe tomorrow at 3pm.
Maria Lopez
Looking forward to our coffee meet-up tomorrow!
Klaus Mueller
Great! I'll see you tomorrow at 3pm, Maria.
Maria Lopez
Great! I'll see you tomorrow at 3pm, Klaus.
Klaus Mueller
Looking forward to discussing my research on gentrification with you tomorrow!
Maria Lopez
I'll make sure to come prepared with questions for you tomorrow.
Klaus Mueller
Should I bring my laptop to show you some of the data I've collected?
Maria Lopez
That would be helpful, Klaus. Looking forward to our coffee meet-up tomorrow!
Klaus Mueller
Perfect, I'll make sure to bring my laptop tomorrow then. See you at Hobbs Cafe!
Maria Lopez
See you tomorrow at 3pm, Klaus! Have a great rest of your day.
Klaus Mueller
Great, looking forward to our coffee meet-up! I'll make sure to bring some of the key articles related to my research findings as well.
